column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Chan says : " All right , listen .
#Text=Careful .
#Text=You could puncture the hull of an empire - class Fire Nation battleship , leaving thousands to drown at sea , because it 's so sharp .
#Text=" Chan says : " Um ... thanks .
#Text=" Ruon - Jian says : " Hey !
#Text=First ones here , huh ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " He thinks he 's so great .
#Text=Well , what do you think of him ?
#Text=" Mai says : " I do n't have any opinion about him .
#Text=I hardly know him .
#Text=" Zuko says : " You like him , do n't you ?
#Text=" Ember Island teenager # 2 says : " So how do you know Ty Lee ?
#Text=" Ember Island teenager # 3 says : " I met her at the beach today .
#Text=She was pretty impressed by a sand pagoda that I made for her .
#Text=" Ember Island teenager # 1 says : " Well , I met her first .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " Look , i - it does n't matter who I met first , 'cause I like you all .
#Text=" Ember Island teenager # 2 says : " But which one of us do you like ?
#Text=" Ember Island teenager # 1 says : " Yeah .
#Text=" Ember Island teenager # 3 says : " Tell us .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " I do n't know !
#Text=I do n't know !
#Text=Oh , I 'm glad you 're here .
#Text=Those boys wo n't leave me alone .
#Text=I guess they all just like me too much .
#Text=" Azula says : " Come on , Ty Lee .
#Text=You ca n't be this ignorant .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " What are you talking about ?
#Text=" Azula says : " Those boys only like you because you make it so easy for them .
#Text=You 're not a challenge .
#Text=You 're a tease .
#Text=It 's not like they actually care who you are .
#Text=Okay , okay , calm down .
#Text=I did n't mean what I said .
#Text=Look , maybe I just said it because I was a little ... jealous .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " What ?
#Text=You 're jealous of me ?
#Text=But you 're the most beautiful , smartest , perfect girl in the world .
#Text=" Azula says : " Well , you 're right about all those things .
#Text=But , for some reason , when I meet boys , they act as if I 'm going to do something horrible to them .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " But you probably would do something horrible to them .
#Text=I 'm sure they 're just intimidated by you .
#Text=Okay , look , if you want a boy to like you , just look at him and smile a lot and laugh at everything he says even if it 's not funny .
#Text=" Azula says : " Well , that sounds really shallow and stupid ... Let 's try it .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " Okay .
#Text=Hey there , sweet sugar cakes .
#Text=How you liking this party ?
#Text=" Mai says : " I 'm bored .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I know .
#Text=" Mai says : " I 'm hungry .
#Text=" Zuko says : " So what ?
#Text=" Mai says : " So , find me some food .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Sure .
#Text="
